comments.raw_text:
User was prompted to login with browser id, and wasn't sure what that was, and what it meant. 
	
"log in with browser ID - I don't know what that is"
comments.text:

comments.raw_text: This is probably more of an issue with identification of understanding what browser ID is, not Soup itself. Should this issue be moved out of Soup to a component regarding browser ID?
comments.author: jsmith@mozilla.com
comments.creator: jsmith@mozilla.com
comments.text: This is probably more of an issue with identification of understanding what browser ID is, not Soup itself. Should this issue be moved out of Soup to a component regarding browser ID?

comments.raw_text: There's a microscopic learn more link on the bottom of the sign in window which is not really visible.
